_metadata.description: HED sidecar for Turner Lab M1 MPTP trials table columns

center_target_appearance_time.Description: Time when center target appeared for monkey to align cursor and initiate trial (seconds)
center_target_appearance_time.HED: Sensory-event, Experimental-stimulus, Visual-presentation, Go-signal, Time-value/# s

lateral_target_appearance_time.Description: Time when lateral target appeared signaling monkey to move from center to flexion/extension position (seconds)
lateral_target_appearance_time.HED: Sensory-event, Experimental-stimulus, Visual-presentation, Cue, Time-value/# s

cursor_departure_time.Description: Time when cursor exited from start position after lateral target appearance. Detected by cursor position leaving start zone boundary (seconds)
cursor_departure_time.HED: Agent-action, (Animal-agent, Experiment-participant), Participant-response, (Move, Elbow), Time-value/# s

reward_time.Description: Reward delivery. The animal received a drop of juice or food for successful completion of the task (seconds)
reward_time.HED: Sensory-event, Experimental-stimulus, Gustatory-presentation, Feedback, Reward, Time-value/# s

torque_perturbation_onset_time.Description: Onset time of unpredictable torque impulse (0.1 Nm, 50ms) applied to manipulandum 1-2s after center target capture (seconds)

derived_movement_onset_time.Description: Onset time of target capture movement derived from kinematic analysis (seconds)

derived_movement_end_time.Description: End time of target capture movement derived from kinematic analysis (seconds)

derived_peak_velocity.Description: Peak velocity during target capture movement derived from kinematic analysis (deg/s)

derived_peak_velocity_time.Description: Time of peak velocity during target capture movement derived from kinematic analysis (seconds)
derived_peak_velocity_time.HED: Agent-action, (Animal-agent, Experiment-participant), (Move, Elbow), Data-maximum, Time-value/# s

derived_movement_amplitude.Description: Amplitude of target capture movement derived from kinematic analysis (degrees)

derived_end_position.Description: Angular joint position at end of target capture movement (degrees)
